idea-plugin.name: swagger-annotation-tool
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin can help you transform comment(include // or /** */) to springfox annotation.if there is no any comment, it can automatic add annotation by translating the filed name,so you'd better take a canonical name.
Springfox-swagger Tool (springfox-Swagger Tool) In the model, the interface on the field is generally relatively few, I personally do not feel the need to automatically generate. Next,it will support custom translation,and generate in controller.
usage: right click,choose "swagger-tool",then choose the transform method. 使用方法： 只有在java文件中swagger-tool才可用。右键swagger-tool，选择转换方式
转换不翻译：如果有注释，直接采用注释，没有注释则不生成 转换翻译：如果有注释，直接采用注释，没有注释则翻译后生成注释
idea-plugin.change-notes:
v1.2.1 support transform single line comment to @ApiModelProperty
v1.2.1 添加当行注解转换

v1.2 In if there is no comment,will translator field first,then generate the annotation
v1.2 增加没有注解，自动根据字段名翻译，建议字段名取得易读

v1.1 In the model,transform comment(/** xx */) to springfox-swagger @ApiModelProperty
v1.1 在Model种,把/** xx */注释转换成springfox-swagger的@ApiModelProperty
